segments.advisor_message: So, um, can you tell me about yer, uh, ownership status of the property? I understand that could help us, um, figure things out better.
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, um, I own my place, so it's owned, right? And, uh, yeah, I live in, um, a house, I guess you could say.

segments.advisor_message: Right, that makes sense. And, um, can you share yer, uh, address details, like the street name and postcode?
segments.client_message: Sure! So, um, my address is, uh, 25 Maple Street, and the, uh, postcode is 12345. I also live in, um, Springfield, you know?
